QuestData.Title: Behind the Veil
QuestData.Description: Soon after the orcs swept in, Veil Akraz was laid to waste by a beam of light from Skyreach.$B$B<Ishaal's eyes glass over as he peers into his orb.>$B$BIt seems they missed their true target. Zellek is still there, hiding in the realm of shadow.$B$BAnd... someone else as well. The orc assassin who used my orb.$B$BTake this. Drink it in Veil Akraz and find Zellek.$B$BOh, and be careful. It's a little more potent than the last one. You'll see...
QuestData.LogDescription: Drink the Major Elixir of Shadows at Zellek's hut in Veil Akraz.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, you are not stabbing me yet.$B$BThat is a good sign.
